suggested_features.title: Hero Section
suggested_features.why: A hero section provides an immediate, eye-catching introduction to you and your primary offering, setting the tone for the entire site with a professional, clean aesthetic.

suggested_features.title: Projects/Work Showcase
suggested_features.why: This is crucial for a software development portfolio, allowing you to display your best web apps, mobile apps, and data science projects with details, technologies used, links to repos, and live demos.

suggested_features.title: Detailed Project Case Studies
suggested_features.why: Showcase your projects with in-depth case studies, technical breakdowns, and optional client testimonials, similar to how Microsoft Azure presents its solutions, providing a comprehensive view of your work.

suggested_features.title: Project Filtering & Categorization
suggested_features.why: Given you have different project types (web, mobile, data science), a filtering system will allow visitors to easily navigate and focus on projects most relevant to their interests, enhancing the user experience.

suggested_features.title: About Me Section
suggested_features.why: A dedicated section to share your story, technical skills, and experiences, presented as a formal resume-like summary, helps visitors connect with you on a professional level.

suggested_features.title: Professional & Responsive Design System
suggested_features.why: To achieve a 'Microsoft level aesthetic', a robust and responsive design system will ensure a clean, modern, intuitive, and consistent user experience across all devices and screen sizes.
